title: American Horror Story Season 10 Title Revealed!
author: Reel Talk
comment: Haha just season 10? Buddy, we're gonna get TWO PARTS, TWO SEASONS the same year plus the spin off 😭✨ This is OUR year!
I think 1984 is one of the best seasons of AHS. Really creative and different

The concept is intriguing, I would love two stories that have seperate plots but are connected by something..I have a feeling maybe Provincetown could be the connection. He has recently stated there are two different casts for each story. So rather than connected by characters they’ll be connected by theme maybe

Yes! As apposed to 1 season segregated into 2 parts like we've gotten before, we'll have 2 mini seasons bundled together to tell one overarching tale. Season 1 Mayflower/Cruise 1620 and Season 2 Helltown/Beach 2020, the tie in relating to the sharp toothed creatures!
What about mermaids/sirens - they get legs and go to land- straight up little Mermaid style, but they’re evil!
description:
American Horror Story Season 10 will be named "Double Feature" with one part of the story taking place on the sea and the other taking place on the sand. What does this mean for the overall season? Will it be closer to Roanoke or something completely different? What does this tell us about the spinoff series? Let's discuss!
